inclusion.criterion: Men and women of any ethnic origin aged ≥ 18 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical trial within 30 days prior to randomization
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass, presenting with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy showing pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
